name: FiftyTifty - Thrall Rebalance
description:
-Lifts all human enemies up to level 50
-Buffs tier 1, 2, & 3 thralls
-Reduces the thralls' health to that of the unconverted thralls
-Also applies to animals, monsters, pets, and bosses :D
changeNote:
Lost everything in a reinstall of Windows, so I went ahead and rebuilt it from the ground up, balanced everything added in the updates, and broadened the scope to animals, monsters, and bosses.

This took about an hour and a half to make. You're bloody welcome like.
author: FiftyTifty
